alert.note: Alert for Gove; Logan; Sheridan; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued April 10 at 5:56PM CDT until April 10 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Thomas County in northwestern Kansas... Northeastern Logan County in west central Kansas... Southwestern Sheridan County in northwestern Kansas... Northwestern Gove County in west central Kansas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 554 PM CDT, an area of dust was detected near Colby moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Less than two miles visibility. SOURCE...Satellite Observed. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 43 and 87. Locations impacted include... Colby, Oakley, Grinnell, Levant, Rexford, Monument and Gem. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
